techResume.name: EN - Soffware Engineer
techResume.aboutMe: With nearly five years of experience as a software engineer, I've been involved in more than 20 different projects, including some with prominent companies in the Brazilian market. Throughout this journey, I've gained hands-on experience in applying best practices, creating value for companies through high-performance, scalable, and resilient applications.

strengths.name: Self-taught Person
strengths.description: Powered by Internet: Online Courses, Youtube, Blogs, etc.

strengths.name: Cooperative
strengths.description: Teamwork, with respect and passion for success.

workExperiences.title: Sr. Software Engineer
workExperiences.description:
Having the responsibility for developing various exchange products and services for the largest bank in Latin America, I created cutting-edge solutions to serve millions of customers who access the mobile app every day.

As the main frontend reference for the team, I created standards and guidelines collaboratively and assisted the entire team in building quality and scalable applications.

workExperiences.title: Software Engineer
Software Engineer
workExperiences.description:
In this opportunity, I helped build from scratch, from conception to development, a white-label web application for the main product of one of the largest HealthTech companies in the Brazilian market.

Additionally, I worked on the maintenance and creation of new features for the mobile version of the application.

educationExperiences.title: Control and Automation Engineering
educationExperiences.lines: Robotics and Control and Automation Engineering
